SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Card
Represents a playing card with a suit and rank.
Chat
Represents a single chat message in the game.
ChatUI
Chat UI contains two sections -- one to display chat history and the other to let user edit and send their messages.
Controller
The Controller class manages the interaction between the Model (Game logic) and the View (User Interface).
Game
Represents the core logic and state of the game.
GameZoneUI
GameZoneUI is where the players play their cards and see announcements.
LeaderboardUI
A ui component that shows names, ranks and scores of the players.
MenuBarUI
Represents the menu bar UI for the game, containing menus and menu items for game settings and actions.
Player
Represents a player in the game
UI
The primary container of the game.
